channel.title: Shop help?
channel.description:
Hey guys im coding a 562 rs2hd and when i click trade on a dude it opens shop. Some dudes like Kaqemeex doesnt have a trade option. how do i open a shop by clicking talk to?
I looked and there is no shops set up that way so i have nothing to base it off of please help spanks :)

item.title: Shop help?
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hmmm… Well IK theres some NPC that has a herblore cape that trades, I’ll look.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help?
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

Obviously i cud do that… But other npcs dont wear herblore skill cape… I know i cud choose ppl with that option but i dont want to. I want the shop to open when clicking talk to…

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help?
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Just find a npc with the trade option, if you want him to have a certain name you can change that too, any questions just ask me.

Read full topic
